nodes.text: Clezo was a Rodian Vigo of Black Sun during the time of Prince Xizor. He was especially skilled at selecting the proper personnel for success, and endeavored to provide his part of Black Sun with diverse interests and holdings.
His ship was the Treasure of Rodia, a Dzundo-class star yacht.
Clezo provided funding for House Tresario of the Bounty Hunters' Guild.
Clezo was a subdued, but well-tailored dresser. He was considered short for his species.
